title: I was stalked for my entire block by two coyotes who were not afraid of the usual hazing methods or my Great Dane. Are there any devices I can use to scare off multiple coyotes who are not afraid of humans? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are in town…??? Call you local Animal Control Officer and report the issue. Expect the Officer to set up a live trap and relocate the offenders. If you are out in “Deplorables Country”…?? Check your State regulations. Here in Texas, Coyotes that are harassing humans or livestock may be hunted at any time, with any method, no limits, no license needed outside of the permission of the landowner. One long weekend, get some “Must Sell Today!” chicken at the grocery, put it in a 5 gallon bucket with a tight lid and drill a bunch of holes in it. Wire it to a fence post up off the ground to avoid attracting ants… Then spend a few mornings or evenings behind some hay bales with your coffee and a scoped .22 rifle…  Dispose of the carcasses in a quiet pasture… Let the buzzards and ants clean up.
